title: Unbelievable Miracle: Dead women alive in Karachi
content:
KARACHI  – A woman who was declared dead breath again in Edhi Center Karachi on Monday, Thenewstribe.com learnt from media reports. 
  
A woman identified as Manzoora Mai, declared dead and shifted to Edhi Center for the preparation of funeral ceremony. 
 
During funeral ablution  she breath again. The woman who was giving her funeral ablution claimed that when he touched Manzoora Mai’s hand she got shocked and woman’s heart start beating. 
 
Worker claimed that when she started recitation of ‘Kalma’ Manzoora Mai started to recite the words “Ya  Mustafa, Marhaba.”
